SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart.synopsis: Karlach and romance partner night scene after completing Forging of the Heart and if she chose the upgrade to have sex.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart.how_to_trigger: With Karlach in the party as a companion:1. oe datekarlach2. Open the camp debug book (Ctrl+Shift+8)3. Queue camp night -> NIGHT)Karlach_TheForgingOfTheHeart4. Go to camp and sleep.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_93.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_93.text: I think the others are asleep. Hi.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_93.context: CinematicNodeContext: She approaches the player and starts flaming in purpleNodeContext: nervous, like a high school kid

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_58.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_58.text: Since I met you, all I wanted was to be close to you.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_43.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_43.text: We're sure I won't hurt you, right?
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_43.context: NodeContext: Hint of nerves, looking for reassurance.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_22.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_22.text: Believe me, I can handle myself. And you.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_116.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_116.context: CinematicNodeContext: She steps forward and gets close to the player.NodeContext: Domme energy

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_108.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_108.context: CinematicNodeContext: She steps forward and gets close to the player.NodeContext: Domme energy

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_6.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_6.text: My name sounds so good in your mouth.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the playerNodeContext: Sharp intake of breath.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_90.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_90.text: I'd like to take you to bed now.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_90.context: CinematicNodeContext: She begins to burn technicolorNodeContext: Domme energy, insistent but waiting for player's agreement before proceeding

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_35.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_35.text: Gods be damned, it's a good day to be alive.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_35.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black.

(Note: The following descriptions of how this encounter happens are fluid; intuitions of the actors should take precedence. The described physical actions are a jumping off point rather than an end goal.)

This scene starts slowly. For all her talk, Karlach is a luxuriator, one who is fully aware how much work a simple touch can do. She approaches the player and places a hand on the small of their back, drawing them close. She puts her face in the player's neck and breathes in their scent, then kisses up their neck, to jaw bone, and across to mouth. She pauses to look deeply in the player's eyes, and smiles. Taking their face in her hand, she kisses them deeply. After a moment she begins tracing her hands from their ribs to their back, running a hand down their back to their ass, and holds their cheek/chin with the other hand. As the kissing gets more intense, Karlach starts to gain momentum. If avatar is female she might part avatar's legs with her knee and intiate some sexy grinding while continuing to kiss the player, one hand on player's hip. If avatar is male, she might collapse to the ground, player cross-legged, herself straddling player, and reach down with one hand to stroke the player. _Things escalate from there_

----

Karlach has not been able to be intimate with anyone for 10 years, so for her, sexually, a little goes a long way. A caress is enough to get her engine well and truly roaring, and sexual contact itself will be an experience of pure bliss. Karlach lingers on touches, on deep kissing, on a sense of sexual abundance and guilelessness that allows her to achieve creative flow within a sexual context. Slowness, luxuriousness, and sensuality are the name of the game.

Karalch is sexually powerful and confident - dominant energy but vanilla, ii.e. she would not engage in biting, choking, restraint, etc. However, she confidently maneuvers the player into her desired positions (in which she would flow between a more active and passive role without rigidity) and has no difficulty acting on her sexual intuitions. She is a  very congruent person who experiences sexual flow state-- lost in the moment, fully engaged in sensations, enjoying the pure physical joy of it all.NodeContext: This node precedes a fade-to-black that leads to an intimacy scene between Karlach and the player. Player has just told Karlach 'I thought you'd never ask' (to go to bed)

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_49.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_49.text: Gods be damned, it's a good day to be alive.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_49.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_5.text: Gods be damned, it's a good day to be alive.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_5.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_27.text: Gods be damned, it's a good day to be alive.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_27.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black.

(Note: The following descriptions of how this encounter happens are fluid; intuitions of the actors should take precedence. The described physical actions are a jumping off point rather than an end goal.)

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_94.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_94.text: I like you, Karlach, but I don't think I want to sleep together.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_37.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_37.text: Oh - of course. I'm sorry if I misunderstood.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_101.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_101.text: You didn't, but I think I made a mistake. We should just be friends.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_102.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_102.text: My name sounds so good in your mouth.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_102.context: CinematicNodeContext: She kisses the playerNodeContext: Sharp intake of breath.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_57.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_57.text: Actually, I'm not so sure about this.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_8.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_8.text: Are you all right? Did I say something wrong?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_66.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_66.text: No, but I want to skip the talk. Let's go to bed - now.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_52.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_52.text: No, but I just think I might prefer to sleep alone tonight after all.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_9.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_9.text: I just need to slow things down.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_12.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_12.text: Slow. To tell you the truth, I feel like I have two modes: Off and on, on, on.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_2.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_2.text: You might have to show me how 'slow' works.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_80.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_80.text: I want to talk about what Dammon said - about your engine burning out.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_97.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_97.text: Later. I promise. Right now I just... I just can't.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_71.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_71.text: I understand. It's all a bit overwhelming.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_48.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_48.text: You said it. But... when I'm with you, all that seems manageable. If I can have you, I'll take the rest.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_32.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_32.text: Fuck yes I am. Especially while my ultimate fantasy is right within reach.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_86.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_86.text: Feather in my cap that I've survived this long without being able to be close to you.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_129.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_129.text: What do you want to do instead?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_0.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_0.text: I think you know what I want. But what you want is the most important thing.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_110.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_110.text: I want to get to know you more. Get close to you - without going too far.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_10.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_10.text: You're in charge, soldier. Hey, I have an idea.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_95.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_95.text: Put your hand on her hip.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_72.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_72.text: Hmm. Maybe I like slow after all. So erm... can I kiss you now?
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_72.context: NodeContext: Slow, growing breathless, lowered voice

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_114.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_114.text: I said slow, Karlach, slow! Kissing comes later.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_75.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_75.text: Right. Yes. Got it. So... do you... erm... help me, I don't know how to do this.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_107.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_107.text: In your defence, you've been in the Hells an awfully long time.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_122.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_122.text: Avernus was bad. But being here and unable to touch you for so long was worse, damn it.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_122.context: NodeContext: A little bit of a joke. It wasn't really worse, but right now she feels like is.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_38.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_38.text: Feather in my cap that I lasted this long.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_14.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_14.text: Let's just talk a little. What was your last relationship like?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_51.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_51.text: Same as they all were, I suppose. Quick to flare, quick to fade.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_1.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_1.text: I never really had a chance to grow out of my 'if it moves, climb aboard' dating strategy. I was still in the middle of figuring all that out when Gortash sent me to Avernus.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_40.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_40.text: With you, though - having to wait for someone I wanted so bad. I didn't know I could tolerate so much anticipation.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_56.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_56.text: Feather in my cap, says I.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_85.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_85.text: It's been hard for me, too. I'm so glad I can be close to you now.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_111.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_111.text: Me too. Would you believe me if I said this was probably the best day I've ever had?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_113.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_113.text: Was there really no one, the whole time you were in Avernus?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_30.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_30.text: Even I'm not desperate enough to fuck an imp.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_99.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_99.text: But no - there wasn't anyone.  Couldn't risk it. Had to survive. And look - it all worked out.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_60.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_60.text: Would you believe me if I said this was probably the best day of my life?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_20.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_20.text: Now that's a feather in my cap.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_96.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_96.text: This is getting difficult, you know. Being this close to you. It's almost more than I can take.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_15.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_15.text: Look at that. Not even a light singeing.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and Karlach kiss - a kiss that goes from demure to passionate. She starts to burn in technicolor

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_121.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_121.text: Since I met you, all I wanted to do was touch you. Now that I can, I never want to let you go.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_23.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_23.text: I hope you know that I'm yours. Completely. And I'd like to take you to bed now.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_23.context: NodeContext: Domme energy, insistent but waiting for player's agreement before proceeding

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_74.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_74.text: Easy, tiger. I want to explore what we have, but I don't want to move too fast.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_42.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_42.text: I don't mean to push. I just... I feel like my skin's on fire. In a good way this time.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_91.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_91.text: But you're in charge, soldier. Help me: what comes next? I might be a little out of my depth here.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_120.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_120.text: I want to be close to you, but I'm not ready to go all the way.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_68.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_68.text: I'm happy with halfway. Or a quarter of the way. Or any part of the way you're happy with.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_127.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_127.text: If you like, we can just lay together...? Clothes on and everything. I just want to be near you.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_131.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_131.text: C'mon and c'mere, you. I've already spent too much time without you in my arms.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_131.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach and the player settle down by the fire. They hug sweetly; the player pulls back and kisses Karlach on the cheek. Karlach kisses the player on the forehead. They lay down, KArlach in the big spoon position, and snuggle up, drifting off to sleep.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_100.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_100.text: C'mon and c'mere, you. I've already spent too much time without you in my arms.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach and the player settle down by the fire. They hug sweetly; the player pulls back and kisses Karlach on the cheek. Karlach kisses the player on the forehead. They lay down, KArlach in the big spoon position, and snuggle up, drifting off to sleep.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_76.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_76.text: I think I should probably just head to bed - alone.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_45.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_45.text: Oh - I'm sorry if I... never mind. You're right.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach's fire extinguishesNodeContext: Awkward

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_73.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_73.text: Sleep well. I'll try to do the same.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_73.context: NodeContext: Disappointed but trying not to show it. Still affectionate toward you.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_11.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_11.text: I think this has all gone too far. I've made a mistake - we should just be friends.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_61.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Karlach's fire extinguishesNodeContext: She's genuinely hurt but trying to play it off a little.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_137.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_137.text: Look, I respect your decision. Of course I do. But right now I need more than a friend.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_44.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_44.text: We'll chat in the morning. Sleep well.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_18.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_18.text: Look at that. Not even a light singeing.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and Karlach kiss - a kiss that goes from demure to passionate. She starts to burn in technicolor

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_24.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_24.text: Hang on, this has gone too far. I think I want to be alone after all.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_47.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_47.text: That can't be true. Can it?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_132.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_132.text: Soldier's honour. Being next to you right now... it's almost more than I can take.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_55.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_55.text: Actually, I think I want to go to bed - alone.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_126.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_126.text: Don't worry about it. Goodnight, Karlach.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_63.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_63.text: What did you have in mind?

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_135.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_135.text: I want to touch you as deeply as you can be touched. I want you to be mine - completely.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_88.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_88.text: On second thought, let's slow things down.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_104.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_104.text: Well actually... it might be better for us to sleep alone for the time being.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_39.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_39.text: Like a... creature. Pulse. Heat. Desire.

SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_59.speaker: Karlach
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_59.text: I can't believe this is finally happening.
SD_ROM_ForgingOfTheHeart_59.context: NodeContext: In response to the player 'shifting awkwardly,' so she's responding to that awkwardness but recovering from it. Excited still.
